pages.text: An empty bucket can hold more than a few liquids! Right clicking a $(thing)Small Slime$() or a $(thing)Bat$() with it will stick the small critter in there. You can then move them around, and release them at any point.$(br2)Additionally, each of these can provide special benefits to the person who picked them up.
A $(thing)Small Slime$() inside of a bucket will react to areas where slimes can spawn$(br2)While the slime is in your hand, it'll jump slightly when you're in a $(thing)Slime Chunk$().
A $(thing)Bat$() captured in a bucket won't do you too good. However, should you release it, the bat will do you a small favor, and make any monsters around you glow for a small period of time.
